parameters.name: resourceGatewayIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID or ARN of the resource gateway.

parameters.name: securityGroupIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the security groups associated with the resource gateway. (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: ipAddressType
nested_items.description: The type of IP address used by the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the security groups associated with the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The IDs of the VPC subnets for the resource gateway.

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC for the resource gateway.
